error.message: No matching action was found on controller 'MVCUI.Areas.Admin.Controllers.UserController'. This can happen when a controller uses RouteAttribute for routing, but no action on that controller matches the request.
error.detail: System.Web.HttpException (0x80004005): No matching action was found on controller 'MVCUI.Areas.Admin.Controllers.UserController'.
